text: Jean-Paul Garraud (born February 27, 1956 in Toulouse, Haute-Garonne) is a former member of the National Assembly of France. He represented the 10th constituency of the Gironde department, and was a member of the Union for a Popular Movement, later The Republicans. He is currently an independent; however, he was elected under the National Rally list along with other independent, Thierry Mariani, in the 2019 European Parliament election in France.https://www.channelnewsasia.com/news/world/ex-sarkozy-minister-jumps- conservative-ship-to-join-french-far-right-11103410 ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:People from Toulouse Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:The Republicans (France) politicians Category:National Rally (France) politicians Category:The Popular Right Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:MEPs for France 2019–2024 Category:National Rally (France) MEPs Category:Knights of the National Order of Merit (France) Category:Politicians from Occitanie
title: Jean-Paul Garraud
